balance_points

Source: R/balance_points.R
balance_points.Rd

Balance number of points

balance_points(pattern, n, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

pattern

ppp object.
n

Either an integer or a ppp object.
verbose

Print messages.

Value

ppp

Details

The function balances out the number of points in the input pattern to either the provided number of points as integer or the same number of points if a ppp object is provided.

Examples

set.seed(42)
input <- spatstat::rpoispp(lambda = 100)
input_b <- spatstat::rpoispp(lambda = 100)

balance_points(pattern = input, n = 110)

#> > Relative difference between pattern and n: 0.03
#> Planar point pattern: 110 points
#> window: rectangle = [0, 1] x [0, 1] units
balance_points(pattern = input, n = input_b)

#> > Relative difference between pattern and n: 0.27
#> Planar point pattern: 83 points
#> window: rectangle = [0, 1] x [0, 1] units
